trans-unit.source: “Creating and Hosting a Personal Site on GitHub”
trans-unit.target: “在GitHub上创建和托管个人网站”

trans-unit.source: “Jekyll is a well-architected throwback to a time before WordPress, when men were men, and HTML was static. I like the ideas it espouses, and have made a few improvements to it’s core. Here, I’ll point out some highlights of my fork in the hopes that they see usage beyond this site.”
trans-unit.target: “ Jekyll是一个经过精心设计的倒退，可以追溯到WordPress之前的时代，那时男人是男人，而HTML是静态的。我喜欢它所支持的想法，并且对其核心进行了一些改进。在这里，我将指出我的分叉的一些亮点，希望他们看到此站点以外的用途。”

trans-unit.source: “Jekyll is everything that I ever wanted in a blogging engine. Really. It isn’t perfect, but what’s excellent about it is that if there’s something wrong, I know exactly how it works and how to fix it. It runs on the your machine only, and is essentially an added”build” step between you and the browser. I coded this entire site in TextMate using standard HTML5 and CSS3, and then at the end I added just a few little variables to the markup. Presto-chango, my site is built and I am at peace with the world.”
trans-unit.target: “ Jekyll是我在博客引擎中想要的一切。真。它不是完美的，但是最棒的是，如果出现问题，我确切知道它是如何工作的以及如何解决。它仅在您的计算机上运行，​​本质上是您和浏览器之间添加的“构建”步骤。我使用标准HTML5和CSS3在TextMate中对整个网站进行了编码，然后最后我在标记中仅添加了一些小变量。Presto-chango，我的网站建成了，与世界和平。”

trans-unit.source: A layout that compresses HTML: GitHub Pages compatible, configurable way to compress HTML files on site build.

trans-unit.source: Pug plugin by Doug Beney: Use the popular Pug (previously Jade) templating language in Jekyll. Complete with caching, includes support, and much more.

trans-unit.source: Jekyll-assets by ixti: Rails-alike assets pipeline (write assets in CoffeeScript, Sass, LESS etc; specify dependencies for automatic bundling using simple declarative comments in assets; minify and compress; use JST templates; cache bust; and many-many more).
trans-unit.target: 哲基尔资产由ixti：Rails的相似资产管道（在CoffeeScript中，萨斯，LESS等等写入资产;指定资产使用简单的声明的评论自动捆绑依赖，缩小和压缩;利用JST模板;缓存胸围和多对多更多）。

trans-unit.source: Buddy is a Docker-based CI server that you can set up in 15-20 minutes to build, test, and deploy your Jekyll websites. It supports GitHub, Bitbucket, and GitLab repositories, and can be installed on-premises or used in cloud. The following guide will show you how to set up a free environment to build and test your Jekyll project.
trans-unit.target: Buddy是基于Docker的CI服务器，您可以在15-20分钟内对其进行设置，以构建，测试和部署Jekyll网站。它支持GitHub，Bitbucket和GitLab存储库，并且可以在本地安装或在云中使用。以下指南将向您展示如何建立一个免费的环境来构建和测试您的Jekyll项目。

trans-unit.source: jekyll-humanize: This is a port of the Django app humanize which adds a “human touch” to data. Each method represents a Fluid type filter that can be used in your Jekyll site templates. Given that Jekyll produces static sites, some of the original methods do not make logical sense to port (e.g. naturaltime).
trans-unit.target: jekyll-humanize：这是Django应用程序humanize的一个端口，为数据添加了“人性化”的感觉。每种方法都代表一个可以在Jekyll网站模板中使用的Fluid类型的过滤器。鉴于Jekyll产生静态站点，因此某些原始方法对端口移植（例如自然时间）没有逻辑意义。

trans-unit.source: sublime-jekyll: A Sublime Text package for Jekyll static sites. This package should help creating Jekyll sites and posts easier by providing access to key template tags and filters, as well as common completions and a current date/datetime command (for dating posts). You can install this package manually via GitHub, or via Package Control.
trans-unit.target: sublime-jekyll：用于Jekyll静态站点的Sublime Text软件包。该软件包应提供对关键模板标签和过滤器的访问权限，以及常用补全和当前日期/日期时间命令（用于约会帖子），有助于简化Jekyll网站和帖子的发布。您可以通过GitHub或Package Control手动安装此软件包。

trans-unit.source: Static Publisher is another automated deployment option with a server listening for webhook posts, though it’s not tied to GitHub specifically. It has a one-click deploy to Heroku, it can watch multiple projects from one server, it has an easy to user admin interface and can publish to either S3 or to a git repository (e.g. gh-pages).
trans-unit.target: 静态发布者是服务器可以侦听Webhook帖子的另一种自动化部署选项，尽管它并不专门与GitHub绑定。它具有一键式部署到Heroku的功能，可以在一台服务器上监视多个项目，具有易于管理的用户界面，并且可以发布到S3或git存储库（例如gh-pages）。

trans-unit.source: GitHub Pages are public web pages for users, organizations, and repositories, that are freely hosted on GitHub’s github.io domain or on a custom domain name of your choice. GitHub Pages are powered by Jekyll behind the scenes, so they’re a great way to host your Jekyll-powered website for free.
trans-unit.target: GitHub Pages是面向用户，组织和存储库的公共网页，它们免费托管在GitHub的 github.io 域或您选择的自定义域名上。GitHub Pages由Jekyll在后台提供支持，因此，这是免费托管由Jekyll支持的网站的好方法。

trans-unit.source: GitHub Pages is powered by Jekyll. However, all Pages sites are generated using the --safe option to disable custom plugins for security reasons. Unfortunately, this means your plugins won’t work if you’re deploying to GitHub Pages.
trans-unit.target: GitHub Pages由Jekyll提供支持。但是，出于安全原因，所有的Pages网站都是使用 --safe 选项生成的，以禁用自定义插件。不幸的是，这意味着如果您要部署到GitHub Pages，则您的插件将无法使用。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll Money: A Jekyll plugin for dealing with money. Because we all have to at some point.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll Money：一个用于处理金钱的Jekyll插件。因为我们都必须在某个时候。

trans-unit.target: RubyGems（可以通过运行 gem -v 进行检查）

trans-unit.source: WordPress2Jekyll: A WordPress plugin that allows you to use WordPress as your editor and (automatically) export content in to Jekyll. WordPress2Jekyll attempts to marry these two systems together in order to make a site that can be easily managed from all devices.
trans-unit.target: WordPress2Jekyll：一个WordPress插件，可让您使用WordPress作为编辑器，并将（自动）内容导出到Jekyll。WordPress2Jekyll试图将这两个系统结合在一起，以便创建一个可以从所有设备轻松管理的网站。

trans-unit.source: Aerobatic has custom domains, global CDN distribution, basic auth, CORS proxying, and a growing list of plugins all included.

trans-unit.source: no_fenced_code_blocks — By default, Jekyll sets the fenced_code_blocks extension (for delimiting code blocks with triple tildes or triple backticks) to true, probably because GitHub’s eager adoption of them is starting to make them inescapable. Redcarpet’s normal fenced_code_blocks extension is inert when used with Jekyll; instead, you can use this inverted version of the extension for disabling fenced code.
trans-unit.target: no_fenced_code_blocks —默认情况下，Jekyll将 fenced_code_blocks 扩展名（用于分隔具有三斜符或三反引号的代码块）设置为 true ，这可能是因为GitHub急切地采用它们开始使它们不可避免。与Jekyll一起使用时， fenced_code_blocks 的常规fenced_code_blocks扩展名是惰性的；相反，您可以使用扩展的此反向版本禁用受防护的代码。

But, by having an exclude: array defined explicitly in the config file overrides this default setting, which results in some users to encounter an error in building the site, with the following error message:

trans-unit.source: A boolean flag that informs Jekyll whether this plugin may be safely executed in an environment where arbitrary code execution is not allowed. GitHub Pages still won’t load your plugin, but if you submit it for inclusion in core, it’s best for this to be correct!

trans-unit.source: A seeming feature regression in 2.x, the --future flag was automatically enabled. The future flag allows post authors to give the post a date in the future and to have it excluded from the build until the system time is equal or after the post time. In Jekyll 3, this has been corrected. Now, --future is disabled by default. This means you will need to include --future if you want your future-dated posts to generate when running jekyll build or jekyll serve.
trans-unit.target: --future 标志在2.x中似乎是功能回归，已自动启用。将来标志允许帖子作者为帖子指定将来的日期，并将其从构建中排除，直到系统时间等于或晚于发布时间为止。在《杰基尔3》中，此问题已得到纠正。现在，-- --future 默认情况下处于禁用状态。这意味着，如果您希望在运行 jekyll build 或 jekyll serve 时生成将来的帖子，则需要包括 --future 。

trans-unit.source: All blog post files must begin with YAML Front Matter. After that, it’s simply a matter of deciding which format you prefer. Jekyll supports Markdown out of the box, and has myriad extensions for other formats as well, including the popular Textile format. These formats each have their own way of marking up different types of content within a post, so you should familiarize yourself with these formats and decide which one best suits your needs.
trans-unit.target: 所有博客文章文件都必须以YAML Front Matter开头。之后，只需确定您喜欢哪种格式即可。Jekyll 开箱即用地支持Markdown，并且对其他格式（包括流行的Textile格式）也有多种扩展。这些格式都有自己的标记帖子中不同类型内容的方式，因此您应该熟悉这些格式并确定哪种格式最适合您的需求。

trans-unit.source: All files in /assets will be output into the compiled site in the /assets folder just as you’d expect from using Jekyll on your sites.
trans-unit.target: 正如您在站点上使用Jekyll所期望的那样， /assets 中的所有文件都将输出到 /assets 文件夹中的已编译站点中。

trans-unit.source: All the variables set via the command line and your _config.yml are available through the site variable. For example, if you have foo: bar in your configuration file, then it will be accessible in Liquid as site.foo. Jekyll does not parse changes to _config.yml in watch mode, you must restart Jekyll to see changes to variables.
trans-unit.target: 通过命令行和 _config.yml 设置的所有变量都可以通过 site 变量获得。例如，如果您的配置文件中有 foo: bar ，那么它将在Liquid中作为 site.foo 进行访问。 Jekyll不会在 watch 模式下解析对 _config.yml 的更改，您必须重新启动Jekyll才能查看对变量的更改。

trans-unit.source: Any file in /assets will be copied over to the user’s site upon build unless they have a file with the same relative path. You can ship any kind of asset here: SCSS, an image, a webfont, etc. These files behave like pages and static files in Jekyll:

trans-unit.source: As explained on the directory structure page, the _data folder is where you can store additional data for Jekyll to use when generating your site. These files must be YAML, JSON, or CSV files (using either the .yml, .yaml, .json or .csv extension), and they will be accessible via site.data.
trans-unit.target: 如目录结构页面上所述， _data 文件夹是您存储Jekyll生成站点时要使用的其他数据的位置。这些文件必须是YAML，JSON或CSV文件（使用的 .yml ， .yaml ， .json 或 .csv 扩展名），他们将访问通过 site.data 。

trans-unit.source: As explained on the directory structure page, the _posts folder is where your blog posts will live. These files are generally Markdown or HTML, but can be other formats with the proper converter installed. All posts must have YAML Front Matter, and they will be converted from their source format into an HTML page that is part of your static site.
trans-unit.target: 如目录结构页面上所述， _posts 文件夹是您的博客文章所在的目录。这些文件通常是Markdown或HTML，但可以是安装了适当转换器的其他格式。所有帖子都必须具有YAML Front Matter，并且它们将从其源格式转换为属于静态站点的HTML页面。

trans-unit.source: Building a Jekyll site with the default theme is just the first step. The real magic happens when you start creating blog posts, using the front matter to control templates and layouts, and taking advantage of all the awesome configuration options Jekyll makes available.

trans-unit.source: Building, testing, and deploying your Jekyll-generated website can quickly be done with CircleCI, a continuous integration & delivery tool. CircleCI supports GitHub and Bitbucket, and you can get started for free using an open-source or private repository.
trans-unit.target: 使用CircleCI（一种持续集成和交付工具）可以快速完成构建，测试和部署Jekyll生成的网站。CircleCI支持GitHub和Bitbucket，您可以使用开源或私有存储库免费开始使用。

trans-unit.source: Built-in permalink styles are not recognized in YAML Front Matter. As a result, permalink: pretty will not work.
trans-unit.target: 内置的永久链接样式在YAML Front Matter中无法识别。结果， permalink: pretty 将不起作用。

trans-unit.source: By default you should supply the sudo: false command to Travis. This command explicitly tells Travis to run your build on Travis’s container-based infrastructure. Running on the container-based infrastructure can often times speed up your build. If you have any trouble with your build, or if your build does need sudo access, modify the line to sudo: required.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，您应该向Travis 提供 sudo: false 命令。该命令明确告诉Travis在Travis 基于容器的基础架构上运行构建。在基于容器的基础架构上运行通常可以加快构建速度。如果您的构建有任何麻烦，或者您的构建确实需要 sudo 访问，请将行修改为 sudo: required 。

trans-unit.source: By default, collections follow a similar structure in the _site folder as pages, except that the path is prefaced by the collection name. For example: collectionname/mypage.html. For permalink settings that omit the file extension, the path would be collection_name/mypage/index.html.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，集合在 _site 文件夹中的结构与页面类似，不同之处在于路径以集合名称开头。例如： collectionname/mypage.html 。对于省略文件扩展名的永久链接设置，路径为 collection_name/mypage/index.html 。

trans-unit.source: By default, the Jekyll site installed by jekyll new uses a gem-based theme called Minima. With gem-based themes, some of the directories and files are stored in the theme-gem, hidden from your immediate view.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下， jekyll new 安装的Jekyll站点使用名为Minima的基于gem的主题。对于基于gem的主题，某些目录和文件存储在theme-gem中，从您的即时视图中隐藏。

trans-unit.source: By specifying the option in the build command, you avoid having to change values in your configuration files when moving from one environment to another.
trans-unit.target: 通过在构建命令中指定该选项,你可以避免在从一个环境转移到另一个环境时不得不改变配置文件中的值。

trans-unit.source: Content processors can modify certain characters to make them look nicer. trans-unit.source: Either of these approaches are useful because /usr/local is considered a “safe” location on systems which have SIP enabled, they avoid potential conflicts with the version of Ruby included by Apple, and it keeps Jekyll and its dependencies in a sandboxed environment. This also has the added benefit of not requiring sudo when you want to add or remove a gem.
trans-unit.target: 这两种方法中的任何一种都很有用，因为 /usr/local 在启用了SIP的系统上被视为“安全”位置，它们避免了与Apple随附的Ruby版本潜在的冲突，并且将Jekyll及其依赖项保留在沙盒环境中。当您要添加或删除gem时，它还具有不需要 sudo 的额外好处。

trans-unit.source: For better clarity, Jekyll now accepts the commands build and serve. Whereas before you might simply run the command jekyll to generate a site and jekyll --server to view it locally, in v2.0 (and later) you should use the subcommands jekyll build and jekyll serve to build and preview your site.
trans-unit.target: 为了更好地说明，Jekyll现在接受 build 和 serve 命令。在v2.0（及更高版本）中，您可能只需要先运行命令 jekyll 生成一个站点，然后运行 jekyll --server 来在本地查看它，则应使用子命令 jekyll build 和 jekyll serve 构建和预览站点。

trans-unit.source: For example, if your theme has a /_layouts/page.html file, and a page has layout: page in its YAML front matter, Jekyll will first look to the site’s _layouts folder for the page layout, and if none exists, will use your theme’s page layout.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您的主题有一个 /_layouts/page.html 文件，并且页面的YAML 主题中具有 layout: page ，Jekyll将首先查找网站的 _layouts 文件夹以获取 page 布局，如果不存在该页面，则将使用您主题的 page 布局。

trans-unit.source: For the first time, the default syntax highlighter has changed for the highlight tag and for backtick code blocks. Instead of Pygments.rb, it’s now Rouge. If you were using the highlight tag with certain options, such as hl_lines, they may not be available when using Rouge. To go back to using Pygments, set highlighter: pygments in your _config.yml file and run gem install pygments.rb or add gem 'pygments.rb' to your project’s Gemfile.

trans-unit.source: Generators run after Jekyll has made an inventory of the existing content, and before the site is generated. Pages with YAML Front Matters are stored as instances of Jekyll::Page and are available via site.pages. Static files become instances of Jekyll::StaticFile and are available via site.static_files. See the Variables documentation page and Jekyll::Site for more details.
trans-unit.target: 生成器在Jekyll对现有内容进行清点之后且在生成站点之前运行。带有YAML重要事项的页面存储为 Jekyll::Page 实例，并可以通过 site.pages 进行访问。静态文件成为 Jekyll::StaticFile 实例，可以通过 site.static_files 获得。有关更多详细信息，请参见变量文档页面和 Jekyll::Site 。

trans-unit.source: GitHub Pages overrides the “Site Source” configuration value, so if you locate your files anywhere other than the root directory, your site may not build correctly.
trans-unit.target: GitHub的页面覆盖的“网站源”的配置价值，因此，如果您找到的任何地方而不是根目录以外的文件，您的网站可能无法正确生成。

trans-unit.source: GitHub Pages Documentation, Help, and Support
trans-unit.target: GitHub页面 文档、帮助和支持

trans-unit.source: GitHub Pages are initially configured to live under the username.github.io subdomain, which is why repositories must be named this way even if a custom domain is being used.
trans-unit.target: 最初将GitHub Pages配置为位于 username.github.io 子域下，这就是为什么即使使用自定义域也必须以这种方式命名存储库的原因。

trans-unit.source: GitHub Pages are powered by Jekyll behind the scenes, so if you’re looking for a zero-hassle, zero-cost solution, GitHub Pages are a great way to host your Jekyll-powered website for free.
trans-unit.target: GitHub Pages由Jekyll在后台提供支持，因此，如果您正在寻找零麻烦，零成本的解决方案，则GitHub Pages是免费托管基于Jekyll的网站的绝佳方法。

trans-unit.source: GitHub Pages work by looking at certain branches of repositories on GitHub. There are two basic types available: user/organization and project pages. The way to deploy these two types of sites are nearly identical, except for a few minor details.
trans-unit.target: GitHub Pages通过查看GitHub上存储库的某些分支来工作。有两种基本类型可用：用户/组织和项目页面。部署这两种类型的站点的方法几乎相同，除了一些小细节。

trans-unit.source: Hooks are registered to a container and an event name. To register one, you call Jekyll::Hooks.register, and pass the container, event name, and code to call whenever the hook is triggered. For example, if you want to execute some custom functionality every time Jekyll renders a post, you could register a hook like this:
trans-unit.target: 钩子被注册到一个容器和一个事件名上,要注册一个钩子,需要调用Jekyll::Hooks.register,并传递给容器、事件名和代码,以便在触发时调用。要注册一个钩子,你可以调用 Jekyll::Hooks.register,并传递容器、事件名称和代码,以便在钩子被触发时调用。例如,如果你想在每次 Jekyll 渲染一个帖子时执行一些自定义功能,你可以注册一个这样的钩子。

trans-unit.source: If you use a permalink style that omits the .html file extension, each post is rendered as an index.html file inside a folder with the post’s name (for example, categoryname/2016/12/01/mypostname/index.html).

trans-unit.source: If you use the --config flag, Jekyll will ignore your _config.yml file. Want to merge a custom configuration with the normal configuration? No problem. Jekyll will accept more than one custom config file via the command line. Config files cascade from right to left, such that if I run jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config-dev.yml, the values in the config files on the right (_config-dev.yml) overwrite those on the left (_config.yml) when both contain the same key.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 --config 标志，Jekyll将忽略 _config.yml 文件。是否要将自定义配置与常规配置合并？没问题。 Jekyll将通过命令行接受多个自定义配置文件。配置文件从右到左级联，因此，如果我运行 jekyll serve --config _config.yml,_config-dev.yml ，则右侧配置文件（ _config-dev.yml ）中的值将覆盖左侧的配置文件（（ _config.yml ）（两者都包含相同的密钥）。

trans-unit.source: If you use the method described above, please remember that the URLs for all posts and pages contain a leading slash. Therefore, concatenating the site baseurl and the post/page url where site.baseurl = / and post.url = /2013/06/05/my-fun-post/ will result in two leading slashes, which will break links. It is thus suggested that prefixing with site.baseurl only be used when the baseurl is something other than the default of /.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用上述方法，请记住所有文章和页面的URL都包含一个斜杠。因此，在 site.baseurl = / 和 post.url = /2013/06/05/my-fun-post/ 将网站baseurl和post / page url连接起来将导致两个斜杠，这将断开链接。因此建议仅当 baseurl 不是默认值 / 时，才使用 site.baseurl 作为前缀。

trans-unit.source: If you want to host your site in Amazon S3, you can do so by using the s3_website application. It will push your site to Amazon S3 where it can be served like any web server, dynamically scaling to almost unlimited traffic. This approach has the benefit of being about the cheapest hosting option available for low-volume blogs as you only pay for what you use.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在Amazon S3中托管您的网站，则可以使用s3_website应用程序来托管。它将您的站点推送到Amazon S3，可以像在任何Web服务器上一样对其进行服务，并动态扩展到几乎无限的流量。这种方法的优势在于，它是低容量博客可用的最便宜的托管选项，因为您只需为使用的内容付费。

trans-unit.source: In Jekyll 2, any URL constructed from the permalink: field had a trailing slash (/) added to it automatically. Jekyll 3 no longer adds a trailing slash automatically to permalink: URLs. This can potentially result in old links to pages returning a 404 error. For example, suppose a page previously contained the YAML permalink: /:year-:month-:day-:title that resulted in the URL example.com/2016-02-01-test/ (notice the trailing slash), Jekyll internally generates a folder named 2016-02-01-test. In Jekyll 3, the same permalink: generate the file 2016-02-01-test.html and the URL for the same page will be example.com/2016-02-01-test, and consequently any links to the old URL will result in a 404 error. In order to maintain the same URLs and avoid this problem, a trailing slash should be added to the permalink: field, for example permalink: /:year-:month-:day-:title/.
trans-unit.target: 在Jekyll 2中，从 permalink: 字段构造的任何URL 都自动添加了斜杠（ / ）。 Jekyll 3不再自动在 permalink: URL 后面添加斜杠。这可能会导致指向页面的旧链接返回404错误。例如，假设一个页面先前包含YAML permalink: /:year-:month-:day-:title 导致URL example.com/2016-02-01-test/ （请注意后跟斜线），内部是Jekyll生成一个名为 2016-02-01-test 的文件夹。在Jekyll 3中，相同的 permalink: 生成文件 2016-02-01-test.html ，同一页面的URL将为 example.com/2016-02-01-test ，因此任何指向旧URL的链接都将导致404错误。为了维护相同的URL并避免出现此问题，应在 permalink: 字段中添加斜杠，例如 permalink: /:year-:month-:day-:title/ 。

trans-unit.target: 在Jekyll 3及更高版本中，相对永久链接已被弃用。如果您是使用Jekyll 2及以下版本创建的网站，则尝试提供或构建时可能会收到以下错误消息：

trans-unit.source: In Jekyll v1.0, we introduced absolute permalinks for pages in subdirectories. Starting with v2.0, absolute permalinks are opt-out, meaning Jekyll will default to using absolute permalinks instead of relative permalinks. Relative permalink backwards-compatibility was removed in v3.0.
trans-unit.target: 在 Jekyll v1.0 中,我们为子目录中的页面引入了绝对permalinks。从v2.0开始,绝对permalinks是选择退出的,这意味着Jekyll将默认使用绝对permalinks而不是相对permalinks。相对永久链接的向后兼容性在v3.0版本中被移除。

trans-unit.source: Incremental Regeneration

trans-unit.source: Incremental regeneration can be enabled via the --incremental flag (-I for short) from the command-line or by setting incremental: true in your configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过命令行中的 --incremental 标志（简称 -I ）或通过在配置文件中设置 incremental: true 来启用增量再生。

trans-unit.source: Incremental regeneration helps shorten build times by only generating documents and pages that were updated since the previous build. It does this by keeping track of both file modification times and inter-document dependencies in the .jekyll-metadata file.
trans-unit.target: 增量重新生成仅生成自上次构建以来已更新的文档和页面，从而有助于缩短构建时间。它通过跟踪 .jekyll-metadata 文件中的文件修改时间和文档间依赖关系来做到这一点。

trans-unit.source: Incremental regeneration is still an experimental feature

trans-unit.source: Instead of passing string variables to the include, you can pass a reference to a YAML data file stored in the _data folder.
trans-unit.target: 除了将字符串变量传递给include之外，您还可以传递对存储在 _data 文件夹中的YAML数据文件的引用。

trans-unit.source: Instead of placing posts inside of folders, you can specify one or more categories that the post belongs to. When the site is generated the post will act as though it had been set with these categories normally. Categories (plural key) can be specified as a YAML list or a space-separated string.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指定帖子所属的一个或多个类别，而不是将帖子放置在文件夹内。生成网站后，该职位将像正常情况下使用这些类别进行设置一样。类别（复数键）可以指定为YAML列表或以空格分隔的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Instead of repeating this configuration each time you create a new post or page, Jekyll provides a way to set these defaults in the site configuration. To do this, you can specify site-wide defaults using the defaults key in the _config.yml file in your project’s root directory.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll提供了一种在站点配置中设置这些默认值的方法，而不是每次创建新帖子或页面时都重复此配置。为此，您可以使用项目根目录中 _config.yml 文件中的 defaults 键来指定站点范围的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Integrations
trans-unit.target: Integrations

trans-unit.source: Introducing: layout. In Jekyll 2 and below, any metadata in the layout was merged onto the page variable in Liquid. This caused a lot of confusion in the way the data was merged and some unexpected behaviour. In Jekyll 3, all layout data is accessible via layout in Liquid. For example, if your layout has class: my-layout in its YAML front matter, then the layout can access that via {{ layout.class }}.
trans-unit.target: 简介： layout 。在Jekyll 2及更低版本中，布局中的所有元数据都已合并到Liquid中的 page 变量中。这在数据合并方式和一些意外行为方面引起了很多混乱。在Jekyll 3中，可以通过Liquid中的 layout 访问所有布局数据。例如，如果您 class: my-layout 在其YAML主题中具有class：my-layout，则该布局可以通过 {{ layout.class }} 访问它。

trans-unit.source: It is also possible to use glob patterns (currently limited to patterns that contain *) when matching defaults. For example, it is possible to set specific layout for each special-page.html in any subfolder of section folder.3.7.0
trans-unit.target: 匹配默认值时，也可以使用全局模式（当前仅限于包含 * 的模式）。例如，可以在 section 文件夹3.7.0的任何子文件夹中为每个 special-page.html 设置特定的布局。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll Plugins Wanted
trans-unit.target: Jekyll插件想要

trans-unit.source: Jekyll allows you to concoct your sites in any way you can dream up, and it’s thanks to the powerful and flexible configuration options that this is possible. These options can either be specified in a _config.yml file placed in your site’s root directory, or can be specified as flags for the jekyll executable in the terminal.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll允许您以自己梦dream以求的方式来构架网站，这要归功于强大而灵活的配置选项。这些选项可以在站点根目录中的 _config.yml 文件中指定，也可以在终端中指定为 jekyll 可执行文件的标志。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll allows you to customize your Sass conversion in certain ways.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll允许你以某些方式定制你的Sass转换。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll also comes with a built-in development server that will allow you to preview what the generated site will look like in your browser locally.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll还内置了一个开发服务器,可以让你在本地的浏览器中预览生成的网站的样子。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll also has built-in support for syntax highlighting of code snippets using either Pygments or Rouge, and including a code snippet in any post is easy. Just use the dedicated Liquid tag as follows:
trans-unit.target: Jekyll还内置支持使用Pygments或Rouge对代码片段进行语法高亮显示,在任何帖子中包含代码片段都很容易。只需使用专用的Liquid标签,如下所示。

trans-unit.target: Jekyll希望所有包含文件都放在源目录根目录下的 _includes 目录中。在上面的示例中，这会将 _includes/footer.html 的内容嵌入到调用文件中。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll gives this particular group of gems in your Gemfile a different treatment. Any gem included in this group is loaded before Jekyll starts processing the rest of your source directory.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll对 Gemfile 中的这组特殊宝石进行了不同的处理。Jekyll开始处理源目录的其余部分之前，将加载此组中包含的所有gem。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll handles two special Redcarpet extensions:
trans-unit.target: Jekyll处理两个特殊的Redcarpet扩展。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll has a plugin system with hooks that allow you to create custom generated content specific to your site. You can run custom code for your site without having to modify the Jekyll source itself.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll有一个带有钩子的插件系统,允许你创建特定于你的网站的自定义生成内容。你可以为你的网站运行自定义代码,而无需修改Jekyll源码本身。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll has an extensive theme system that allows you to leverage community-maintained templates and styles to customize your site’s presentation. Jekyll themes package up layouts, includes, and stylesheets in a way that can be overridden by your site’s content.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll具有广泛的主题系统，使您可以利用社区维护的模板和样式来自定义网站的演示。Jekyll主题以可以被您的网站内容覆盖的方式打包布局，包含和样式表。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll has built in support for syntax highlighting of over 60 languages thanks to Rouge. Rouge is the default highlighter in Jekyll 3 and above. To use it in Jekyll 2, set highlighter to rouge and ensure the rouge gem is installed properly.
trans-unit.target: 借助Rouge， Jekyll内置了对60多种语言的语法突出显示的支持。胭脂是Jekyll 3及更高版本中的默认荧光笔。要在Jekyll 2中使用它，请将 highlighter 设置为 rouge 并确保 rouge 宝石正确安装。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll is a simple, blog-aware, static site generator. It takes a template directory containing raw text files in various formats, runs it through a converter (like Markdown) and our Liquid renderer, and spits out a complete, ready-to-publish static website suitable for serving with your favorite web server. Jekyll also happens to be the engine behind GitHub Pages, which means you can use Jekyll to host your project’s page, blog, or website from GitHub’s servers for free.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll是一个简单的，可识别博客的静态网站生成器。它获取一个包含各种格式的原始文本文件的模板目录，通过转换器（例如Markdown）和我们的Liquid渲染器运行它，并吐出一个完整的，随时可发布的静态网站，以适合您喜欢的Web服务器。 Jekyll也恰好是GitHub Pages的引擎，这意味着您可以使用Jekyll从GitHub的服务器上免费托管项目的页面，博客或网站。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll is, at its core, a text transformation engine. The concept behind the system is this: you give it text written in your favorite markup language, be that Markdown, Textile, or just plain HTML, and it churns that through a layout or a series of layout files. Throughout that process you can tweak how you want the site URLs to look, what data gets displayed in the layout, and more. This is all done through editing text files; the static web site is the final product.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll的核心是一个文本转换引擎。系统背后的概念是这样的:你把用你最喜欢的标记语言写的文本交给它,无论是Markdown、Textile,还是普通的HTML,它就会把这些文本通过一个布局或一系列布局文件进行转换。在整个过程中,你可以调整你想要的网站URLs的外观,什么数据会显示在布局中,等等。这些都是通过编辑文本文件来完成的;静态网站是最终产品。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll lets you access the site object through the context.registers feature of Liquid at context.registers[:site]. For example, you can access the global configuration file _config.yml using context.registers[:site].config.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll允许您通过 context.registers[:site] 的Liquid 的 context.registers 功能访问 site 对象。例如，您可以使用 context.registers[:site].config 访问全局配置文件 _config.yml 。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll now lets you write draft posts, and allows you to easily preview how they will look prior to publishing. To start a draft, simply create a folder called _drafts in your site’s source directory (e.g., alongside _posts), and add a new markdown file to it. To preview your new post, simply run the jekyll serve command with the --drafts flag.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll现在允许您编写草稿，并允许您轻松预览发布前的外观。要开始草稿，只需在站点的源目录中创建一个名为 _drafts 的文件夹（例如 _posts 旁边），然后向其中添加一个新的markdown文件。要预览您的新帖子，只需运行带有 --drafts 标志的jekyll jekyll serve 命令。

While ‘new’ blogs created with Jekyll v3.4 and greater, will have the following added to their ‘Gemfile’ by default, existing sites will have to update their ‘Gemfile’ (and installed) to enable development on Windows:
trans-unit.target: Jekyll现在使用rubygem基于已建立的IANA时区数据库在内部配置时区。虽然使用Jekyll v3.4或更高版本创建的“新”博客默认情况下会将以下内容添加到其“ Gemfile”中，但现有站点将必须更新（并安装）其“ Gemfile”才能在Windows上进行开发：

trans-unit.source: Jekyll on Windows
trans-unit.target: Jekyll on Windows

trans-unit.source: Jekyll processes all Liquid filters and tags in asset files
trans-unit.target: Jekyll处理资产文件中的所有液体过滤器和标签。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll processes all Liquid filters in code blocks
trans-unit.target: Jekyll在代码块中处理所有液体过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll provides built-in support for Sass and can work with CoffeeScript via a Ruby gem. In order to use them, you must first create a file with the proper extension name (one of .sass, .scss, or .coffee) and start the file with two lines of triple dashes, like this:
trans-unit.target: Jekyll提供对Sass的内置支持，并且可以通过Ruby gem与CoffeeScript一起使用。为了使用它们，你必须首先创建一个适当的扩展名（一个文件 .sass ， .scss ，或 .coffee ），并与两行三重破折号的启动文件，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Jekyll provides hooks for :site, :pages, :posts, and :documents. In all cases, Jekyll calls your hooks with the container object as the first callback parameter. However, all :pre_render hooks and the:site, :post_render hook will also provide a payload hash as a second parameter. In the case of :pre_render, the payload gives you full control over the variables that are available while rendering. In the case of :site, :post_render, the payload contains final values after rendering all the site (useful for sitemaps, feeds, etc).
trans-unit.target: Jekyll为 :site ， :pages ， :posts 和 :documents 提供了钩子。在所有情况下，Jekyll都将容器对象作为第一个回调参数来调用钩子。但是，所有 :pre_render 挂钩和 :site, :post_render 挂钩还将提供有效负载哈希作为第二个参数。对于 :pre_render ，有效负载使您可以完全控制渲染时可用的变量。对于 :site, :post_render ，有效负载包含渲染所有站点后的最终值（对站点地图，提要等有用）。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll runs with the following configuration options by default. Alternative settings for these options can be explicitly specified in the configuration file or on the command-line.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll 运行时默认使用以下配置选项。这些选项的其他设置可以在配置文件或命令行中明确指定。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll supports loading data from YAML, JSON, and CSV files located in the _data directory. Note that CSV files must contain a header row.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll支持从 _data 目录中的YAML，JSON和CSV文件加载数据。请注意，CSV文件必须包含标题行。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll supports permalinks that contain neither a trailing slash nor a file extension, but this requires additional support from the web server to properly serve. When using these types of permalinks, output files written to disk will still have the proper file extension (typically .html), so the web server must be able to map requests without file extensions to these files.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll支持永久链接，永久链接既不包含斜杠也不包含文件扩展名，但这需要Web服务器提供额外的支持才能正常使用。使用这些类型的永久链接时，写入磁盘的输出文件仍将具有正确的文件扩展名（通常是 .html ），因此Web服务器必须能够将不带文件扩展名的请求映射到这些文件。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll themes set default layouts, includes, and stylesheets. However, you can override any of the theme defaults with your own site content.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll主题设置了默认的布局,包括,和样式表。然而,你可以用你自己的网站内容覆盖任何主题的默认设置。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll traverses your site looking for files to process. Any files with YAML front matter are subject to processing. For each of these files, Jekyll makes a variety of data available via the Liquid templating system. The following is a reference of the available data.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll遍历您的站点以查找要处理的文件。具有YAML优先事项的任何文件都将受到处理。对于这些文件中的每一个，Jekyll都可以通过Liquid模板系统获得各种数据。以下是可用数据的参考。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll treats these files the same as a regular page, in that the output file will be placed in the same directory that it came from. For instance, if you have a file named css/styles.scss in your site’s source folder, Jekyll will process it and put it in your site’s destination folder under css/styles.css.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll将这些文件与常规页面一样对待，因为输出文件将放置在与原始文件相同的目录中。例如，如果您的站点的源文件夹中有一个名为 css/styles.scss 的文件，Jekyll将对其进行处理并将其放在站点的目标文件夹中 css/styles.css 下。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll uses the Liquid templating language to process templates. All of the standard Liquid tags and filters are supported. To make common tasks easier, Jekyll even adds a few handy filters and tags of its own, all of which you can find on this page. Jekyll even lets you come up with your own tags via plugins.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll使用Liquid模板语言来处理模板。支持所有标准的Liquid 标签和过滤器。为了简化常见任务，Jekyll甚至添加了一些方便的过滤器和标签，您可以在此页面上找到所有这些过滤器和标签。Jekyll甚至允许您通过插件提出自己的标签。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll uses the listen gem to watch for changes when the --watch switch is specified during a build or serve. While listen has built-in support for UNIX systems, it may require an extra gem for compatibility with Windows.
trans-unit.target: 当在构建或服务期间指定 --watch 开关时，Jekyll使用 listen gem监视更改。尽管 listen 具有对UNIX系统的内置支持，但可能需要额外的gem才能与Windows兼容。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll will apply all of the configuration settings you specify in the defaults section of your _config.yml file. However, you can choose to override settings from other scope/values pair by specifying a more specific path for the scope.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll将应用您在 _config.yml 文件的 defaults 部分中指定的所有配置设置。但是，您可以通过为范围指定更具体的路径来选择从其他范围/值对中覆盖设置。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll will automatically require all whitelisted runtime_dependencies of your theme-gem even if they’re not explicitly included under the plugins array in the site’s config file. (Note: whitelisting is only required when building or serving with the --safe option.)
trans-unit.target: Jekyll将自动要求您主题数据库中所有列入白名单的 runtime_dependencies ，即使它们未明确包含在站点的配置文件中的 plugins 数组下也是如此。（注意：仅当使用 --safe 选项进行构建或使用时，才需要白名单。）

trans-unit.source: Jekyll will look first to your site’s content before looking to the theme’s defaults for any requested file in the following folders:
trans-unit.target: Jekyll将首先查看您网站的内容，然后查看以下文件夹中任何请求的文件的主题默认值：

trans-unit.source: Jekyll will look for the referenced file (in this case, footer.html) in the _includes directory at the root of your source directory and insert its contents.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll将在源目录根目录的 _includes 目录中查找引用的文件（在本例中为 footer.html ），然后插入其内容。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll will only convert files that have a YAML header at the top, even for converters you add using a plugin.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll只会转换顶部有YAML头的文件,即使是你使用插件添加的转换器。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll’s growing use is producing a wide variety of tutorials, frameworks, extensions, examples, and other resources that can be very helpful. Below is a collection of links to some of the most popular Jekyll resources.
trans-unit.target: Jekyll的使用越来越广泛，正在产生各种各样的教程，框架，扩展，示例以及其他非常有用的资源。以下是一些最受欢迎的Jekyll资源链接的集合。

trans-unit.source: Jekyll-Admin for Rails
trans-unit.target: Jekyll-Admin for Rails

trans-unit.source: Just about any traditional web hosting provider will let you upload files to their servers over FTP. To upload a Jekyll site to a web host using FTP, simply run the jekyll build command and copy the contents of the generated _site folder to the root folder of your hosting account. This is most likely to be the httpdocs or public_html folder on most hosting providers.
trans-unit.target: 几乎所有传统的Web托管提供商都将允许您通过FTP将文件上传到其服务器。要使用FTP将Jekyll站点上传到Web主机，只需运行 jekyll build 命令并将生成的 _site 文件夹的内容复制到托管帐户的根文件夹。在大多数托管服务提供商上，这很可能是 httpdocs 或 public_html 文件夹。

trans-unit.source: Just about every web server configuration you come across will look for an HTML file called index.html (by convention) in the site’s root folder and display that as the homepage. Unless the web server you’re using is configured to look for some different filename as the default, this file will turn into the homepage of your Jekyll-generated site.
trans-unit.target: 您遇到的几乎每种Web服务器配置都将在站点的根文件夹中查找一个名为 index.html （按惯例）的HTML文件，并将其显示为主页。除非将您正在使用的Web服务器配置为寻找其他不同的文件名作为默认文件名，否则该文件将成为Jekyll生成的网站的主页。

trans-unit.source: Kickster provides a basic Jekyll project setup packed with web best practises and useful optimization tools increasing your overall project quality. Kickster ships with automated and worry-free deployment scripts for GitHub Pages.
trans-unit.target: Kickster 提供了一个基本的 Jekyll 项目设置,其中包含了网络最佳实践和有用的优化工具,提高了您的整体项目质量。Kickster为GitHub页面提供了自动和无忧的部署脚本。

trans-unit.source: Not everything is a post or a page. Maybe you want to document the various methods in your open source project, members of a team, or talks at a conference. Collections allow you to define a new type of document that behave like Pages or Posts do normally, but also have their own unique properties and namespace.
trans-unit.target: 并不是所有的东西都是一个帖子或一个页面。也许你想记录你的开源项目中的各种方法、团队成员或会议上的演讲。集合允许你定义一种新的文档类型,它们的行为就像通常的Pages或Post一样,但也有自己独特的属性和命名空间。

trans-unit.source: Note Data Files are included and reloaded during automatic regeneration.
trans-unit.target: 注意包含数据文件并在自动再生期间重新加载。

trans-unit.source: Note if you want to view your site offline without the Jekyll preview server, your browser will need the file extension to display the page, and all assets will need to be relative links that function without the server baseurl.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，如果要在没有Jekyll预览服务器的情况下离线查看站点，则浏览器将需要文件扩展名来显示页面，并且所有资产都需要是相对链接，而无需服务器baseurl即可起作用。

trans-unit.source: Note that GitHub Pages runs in safe mode and only allows a set of whitelisted plugins.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，GitHub Pages在 safe 模式下运行，并且仅允许一组列入白名单的插件。

trans-unit.source: Note that all template variables relating to time or categories are available to posts only.
trans-unit.target: 请注意,所有与时间或类别有关的模板变量仅适用于帖子。

trans-unit.source: Note that in the above table, file can be anything. It’s simply an arbitrarily set variable used in your own logic (such as in a for loop). It isn’t a global site or page variable.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，在上表中， file 可以是任何东西。它只是在您自己的逻辑（例如for循环）中使用的任意设置的变量。它不是全局站点或页面变量。

trans-unit.source: Note that making copies of theme files will prevent you from receiving any theme updates on those files. An alternative, to continue getting theme updates on all stylesheets, is to use higher specificity CSS selectors in your own additional, originally named CSS files.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,复制主题文件将阻止你在这些文件上接收任何主题更新。另一种方法是在你自己的额外的、最初命名的CSS文件中使用更高的CSS选择器,以继续在所有样式表上获得主题更新。

trans-unit.source: Note that the post variable only exists inside the for loop above. If you wish to access the currently-rendering page/posts’s variables (the variables of the post/page that has the for loop in it), use the page variable instead.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， post 变量仅存在于上述 for 循环内。如果要访问当前呈现的页面/帖子的变量（其中包含 for 循环的帖子/页面的变量），请改用 page 变量。

trans-unit.source: Note that the sass_dir becomes the load path for Sass imports, nothing more. This means that Jekyll does not know about these files directly, so any files here should not contain the YAML Front Matter as described above nor will they be transformed as described above. This folder should only contain imports.
trans-unit.target: 注意， sass_dir 成为Sass导入的加载路径，仅此而已。这意味着Jekyll不直接了解这些文件，因此此处的任何文件都不应包含如上所述的YAML前题，也不应如上所述对其进行转换。此文件夹应仅包含导入。

trans-unit.source: Note that upgrading macOS does not automatically upgrade Xcode itself (that can be done separately via the App Store), and having an out-of-date Xcode.app can interfere with the command line tools downloaded above. If you run into this issue, upgrade Xcode and install the upgraded Command Line Tools.
trans-unit.target: 需要注意的是,升级macOS并不会自动升级Xcode本身(可以通过App Store单独升级),而且拥有一个过时的Xcode.app会干扰上面下载的命令行工具。如果遇到这个问题,请升级Xcode并安装升级后的命令行工具。

trans-unit.source: Note that you can also specify a language for highlighting after the first delimiter:
trans-unit.target: 请注意,您也可以在第一个定界符后指定高亮显示的语言。

trans-unit.source: Note that you cannot use the ../ syntax to specify an include location that refers to a higher-level directory.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，不能使用 ../ 语法指定引用更高级别目录的包含位置。

trans-unit.source: Note you cannot add filters to link tags. For example, you cannot append a string using Liquid filters, such as {% link mypage.html | append: "#section1" %} . To link to sections on a page, you will need to use regular HTML or Markdown linking techniques.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，您无法将过滤器添加到 link 标签。例如，您不能使用Liquid过滤器附加字符串，例如 {% link mypage.html | append: "#section1" %} 。要链接到页面上的各个部分，您将需要使用常规的HTML或Markdown链接技术。

trans-unit.source: Notes are handy pieces of information
trans-unit.target: 笔记是方便的信息

trans-unit.source: Now it’s possible to publish your website simply by running the deploy script. If your SSH certificate is passphrase-protected, you will be asked to enter it when the script executes.
trans-unit.target: 现在，只需运行 deploy 脚本即可发布网站。如果您的SSH证书受密码保护，则在脚本执行时会要求您输入它。

trans-unit.target: 现在我们可以安装Ruby。为此，我们将使用BrightBox的存储库，该存储库托管针对Ubuntu的Ruby优化版本。

trans-unit.target: 现在，您需要通过运行单个命令 bundle install 来安装Bundler组中的所有插件。

trans-unit.source: Now, this will only set the layout for files where the type is posts. The different types that are available to you are pages, posts, drafts or any collection in your site. While type is optional, you must specify a value for path when creating a scope/values pair.
trans-unit.target: 现在，这只会设置类型为 posts 的文件的布局。您可以使用的不同类型是 pages ， posts ， drafts 或站点中的任何集合。尽管 type 是可选的，但是在创建 scope/values 对时必须为 path 指定一个值。

trans-unit.source: Of course, you have full control over how (and where) you display your posts, and how you structure your site. You should read more about how templates work with Jekyll if you want to know more.
trans-unit.target: 当然，您完全可以控制显示帖子的方式（和位置）以及网站的结构。如果您想了解更多信息，则应该阅读有关模板如何与Jekyll一起使用的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Often times, you will find that you are repeating a lot of configuration options. Setting the same layout in each file, adding the same category - or categories - to a post, etc. You can even add custom variables like author names, which might be the same for the majority of posts on your blog.
trans-unit.target: 很多时候,你会发现你在重复很多配置选项。在每个文件中设置相同的布局,在一篇文章中添加相同的类别--或类别--等等。您甚至可以添加自定义变量,如作者姓名,这可能对您的博客上的大多数帖子是相同的。

trans-unit.source: Often, you’ll want the ability to run a Jekyll site in multiple places, such as previewing locally before pushing to GitHub Pages. Jekyll 1.0 makes that easier with the new --baseurl flag. To take advantage of this feature, first add the production baseurl to your site’s _config.yml file. Then, throughout the site, simply prefix relative URLs with {{ site.baseurl }}. When you’re ready to preview your site locally, pass along the --baseurl flag with your local baseurl (most likely /) to jekyll serve and Jekyll will swap in whatever you’ve passed along, ensuring all your links work as you’d expect in both environments.
trans-unit.target: 通常，您希望能够在多个地方运行Jekyll网站，例如在推送到GitHub Pages之前在本地预览。 Jekyll 1.0通过新的 --baseurl 标志使此操作变得更加容易。要利用此功能，请首先将生产基本 baseurl 添加到站点的 _config.yml 文件中。然后，在整个站点中，只需在相对URL {{ site.baseurl }} 加上{{site.baseurl}}即可。当您准备好在本地预览站点时，请将 --baseurl 标志与本地baseurl（最可能是 / ）一起传递给jekyll jekyll serve ，Jekyll将交换您传递的所有内容，确保所有链接都可以正常工作d在两种环境中都期望。

You’d obviously need to change the values to reflect your site’s details. There is even a matching TextMate command that will help you run this script.
trans-unit.target: 生成 _site 目录后，您可以使用类似于此deploy脚本的 tasks/deploy shell脚本轻松地对其内容进行scp 更改。显然，您需要更改这些值以反映站点的详细信息。甚至还有一个匹配的TextMate命令将帮助您运行此脚本。

trans-unit.source: One major benefit of using the link or post_url tag is link validation. If the link doesn’t exist, Jekyll won’t build your site. This is a good thing, as it will alert you to a broken link so you can fix it (rather than allowing you to build and deploy a site with broken links).
trans-unit.target: 使用 link 或 post_url 标记的一个主要好处是链接验证。如果该链接不存在，Jekyll将不会建立您的网站。这是一件好事，因为它会提醒您链接断开，因此您可以对其进行修复（而不是允许您使用断开的链接来构建和部署网站）。

trans-unit.source: One of Jekyll’s best aspects is that it is “blog aware”. What does this mean, exactly? Well, simply put, it means that blogging is baked into Jekyll’s functionality. If you write articles and publish them online, you can publish and maintain a blog simply by managing a folder of text-files on your computer. Compared to the hassle of configuring and maintaining databases and web-based CMS systems, this will be a welcome change!
trans-unit.target: Jekyll最好的方面之一是它“了解博客”。这到底是什么意思？简而言之，这意味着博客已融入Jekyll的功能中。如果您撰写文章并在线发布，则只需管理计算机上的文本文件文件夹即可发布和维护博客。与配置和维护数据库以及基于Web的CMS系统的麻烦相比，这将是一个可喜的变化！

trans-unit.source: Other commentary

trans-unit.source: Our friends at GitHub have provided the github-pages gem which is used to manage Jekyll and its dependencies on GitHub Pages. Using it in your projects means that when you deploy your site to GitHub Pages, you will not be caught by unexpected differences between various versions of the gems.
trans-unit.target: 我们在GitHub上的朋友提供了github-pages gem，用于管理Jekyll及其对GitHub Pages的依赖关系。在项目中使用它意味着将站点部署到GitHub Pages时，各种版本的gem之间不会出现意料之外的差异。

trans-unit.source: Outputs the content of the tag.
trans-unit.target: 输出标签的内容。

trans-unit.source: Overall, you can create includes that act as templates for a variety of uses — inserting audio or video clips, alerts, special formatting, and more. However, note that you should avoid using too many includes, as this will slow down the build time of your site. For example, don’t use includes every time you insert an image. (The above technique shows a use case for special images.)
trans-unit.target: 总体而言，您可以创建充当各种用途的模板的包含-插入音频或视频剪辑，警报，特殊格式等。但是，请注意，应避免使用过多的包含，因为这会减慢网站的构建时间。例如，每次插入图像时不要使用包含。（以上技术显示了特殊图像的用例。）
